casebody.data:
HUNTSMAN INTERNATIONAL, LLC and Rubicon, LLC
v.
PRAXAIR, INC. NO. 2018-CC-1532 Supreme Court of Louisiana. January 14, 2019 ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE CIVIL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF ORLEANS Writ denied. WEIMER, J., would grant rehearing and docket. CRICHTON, J., would grant rehearing and assigns reasons. Crichton, J., would grant and assigns reasons. I would grant and docket this application to examine whether Code of Judicial Conduct Canon 3(C) provides an additional ground for recusal independent from the grounds enumerated in La. Code Civ. P. art. 151. In my view, the original per curiam, which recused a respected member of the judiciary, will lead to confusion in the trial courts as to the proper standard for judicial recusal in Louisiana.
